dialogue.text: Hi I am Boss I run the record label of your dreams! I started the label after my band Jet Set Pirate Radio rose waaay back. Maybe you've heard of them?
We got some tips that there are some seriously talented artists in this town, Guide says you may be one of them.
Don't be so modest, you are an amazing singer!
Oh you are a singer! Outsanding! Will you be performing by yourself or with a band?
Thats great, we are always looking for new groups to sling into the spotlight! What sort of band are you working with?
